_comment: Created by EFisher on 12/10/2015 14:29:22 using v2.7
title: Are there differences between staff groups in report being ill due to work related stress?
analysis_commentary: More females report being ill due to work related stress compared to men; in 2014 38% of females compared to 35% of male staff report being ill due to work related stress (data not shown). Also a larger proportion of staff who are disabled compared to staff who are not disabled report having been ill due to work related stress.
